meaning_str.bing:
n. 烟；吸烟；抽烟
v. 抽烟；冒烟；吸（烟）；抽（烟）
网络. 烟雾；烟尘；烟雾弹

烟雾；抽烟；香烟；雪茄烟；<俚>大城市；熏制食品；烟幕
（习惯性）吸烟；抽（烟）；吸食（烟草或毒品）；冒烟；冒气；熏制（食物；肉或鱼）

1.en: The stone respects once smoke hike, two princesses urgently ask her to have what specter idea.
1.cn: 石敬云一走，两公主就急问她有什么鬼点子了。

2.en: The old man looked ahead of him but he could see no sails nor could he see the hull nor the smoke of any ship.
2.cn: 老人朝前望去，他看不见任何帆影，看不见任何一艘船，也看不见船上所冒的烟。

3.en: There had been fuel on the ship, but this did not appear to have caused the fire, and little smoke was produced.
3.cn: 船上有一些燃料，但看来并不是燃料引起火灾的，而且几乎没有产生烟。

0.en: Smoke? I'd better not. I live just up there.
0.cn: 抽烟吗？不用了，我就住在那儿。

1.en: There was the smell of smoke. Alarms sounded.
1.cn: 到处都是烟雾的气味，警报的声响。

2.en: What's going on out there? Smoke, Sir. The southeast.
2.cn: 外面是怎么回事？是狼烟，陛下，东南方。

3.en: Don't swa... Oh. I'm putting smoke in your... Sorry about that.
3.cn: 别扇，噢，我把烟弄到你那去了，抱歉。

4.en: I got you a talking Thomas the Tank Engine for Thanksgiving. With real puffing smoke? Yes. All right. But I'm watching you.
4.cn: 感恩节我送你个托马斯蒸汽火车头。会喷真的烟吗？会。好吧，但我记住你了。

5.en: If you are gonna smoke, only on the balconies. There are fifteen different balconies, choose one if you wanna smoke. OK, I don't smoke.
5.cn: 如果你想抽烟的话，只能在阳台上抽。这儿有15个阳台，你想抽的话选一个。嗯，我不抽烟的。

6.en: I will be joining him there in less than a week. Do you smoke? No.
6.cn: 不到一周我也要去北京。你抽烟吗？不抽。

7.en: You don't secretly smoke, do you? No. So it's just your mother then.
7.cn: 你该不会是偷偷在抽烟吧？不。那就是你妈在抽烟。

8.en: Nancy doesn't smoke. Well, at least the perfume's not mine. Be thankful for that.
8.cn: 南茜可不抽烟。那至少那香水不是我的，你这点到是不用担心。

9.en: She wears the costume. Gunfire in the background. A hint of smoke. Our Mockingjay.
9.cn: 让她穿上制服，用战场作为背景，再来点烟雾，这就是我们的嘲笑鸟。

10.en: No, no, no, no, no. I smell smoke. Well, I didn't turn the oven on yet. Did you? No.
10.cn: 不，不，不，是烟味。我还没开烤炉呢，你开了吗？还没。

11.en: And so I'll say it in Latin or Klingon or smoke signals, if that's not cultural appropriation. It is. Okay, so not smoke signals. But I want to do this right. Me, too. Let's go plan a wedding.
11.cn: 我会用拉丁文和克林贡语说一遍或者是用狼烟信号，如果不会对原住民文化不敬的话。会的。好吧，就不用狼烟。但我想把这件事做好。我也是。那就让我们来计划一场婚礼吧。

12.en: For an authentic Singaporean 'Makan' experience, follow the satay smoke to the nearest hawkers center.
12.cn: 想要体会正宗的新加坡美食？循着炊烟到附近的熟食中心逛逛。

13.en: Hey. Well, hey. Wow, somebody smoked out here? Oh my God, don't people know you're not allowed to smoke in public spaces?
13.cn: 嘿！哇，有人在这里抽烟吗？天啊，难道他们不晓得在公共场所是不可以抽烟的吗？

14.en: Then I'll dust. I did that, too. Then I'll check the batteries in the smoke detectors. Howard just did that. Yeah, let him do it.
14.cn: 那我去扫灰。我也做完了。那我去检查烟雾侦测器里的电池。霍华德刚检查完。没事，让他做吧。

15.en: Humidity is low, it's a dry night, little bit of wind to dispel the smoke, I think they gonna be in for a tremendous treat and it could start any moment now.
15.cn: 湿度低，干燥的夜晚，有点吹散烟雾的微风，他们会好好利用这一情况，现在演出随时。

16.en: You know when the wok's hot enough, when you start to see a little bit of smoke just coming off the surface of the oil and sometimes you can see the oil glisten as well.
16.cn: 油表面开始冒出一点白烟时，你就知道锅已经热得差不多了，有时候也会看到油开始发亮。

17.en: This is huge. I know. How bad do you wanna smoke right now?
17.cn: 这是很大件事。现在想不想抽一支？

18.en: So Frank was my roommate and Frank like nothing more than to smoke weed.
18.cn: 弗兰克是我的室友，他唯一喜欢做的事情就是吸大麻。

19.en: You have an M134 in your armory. Put it on a chopper and smoke this thing.
19.cn: 你们的军械库里有M134机枪，把它装到直升机上，然后干掉这个家伙！
